bioghist.p: Mike Hinge (1930-2003) was a graphic artist. He created science fiction art and covers, and two of his works were used as covers for Time Magazine.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of papers, printed materials, and ephemera of Mike Hinge. Materials include professional correspondence; personal financial and medical records; idea files consisting of images clipped from magazines and newspapers, postcards, advertisements, and handwritten notes; samples of Hinge's work published in comic books, magazines, and books; samples of artwork by other graphic artists; product catalogs, paint samples, type catalogs, and artists catalogs, and reference guides; collections of business cards, cigarette wrappers, SEPTA passes, postcards, paperback covers; posters, calendars, and metal advertising signs; and published books and serials, many of them science fiction-related.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
